data.name: Bleak
data.detailed_description:
TIMELINE

Below is our current roadmap of features which will be ever evolving and could be arranged differently as we progress in development and receive feedback from you, our fans on what you want the most.

-Initial Release
-Multiplayer COOP
-Multiplayer PVP
-More planet types
-Alien flora and fauna
-Ground based vehicles
-Air vehicles
-Full Solar System
-Royale Mode
-Much more


Early Beta Access

TBA


Third Party Hardware Support

RGB Lighting

  • Creative Aurora Reactive
  • Razer Chroma


Sponsors

Thank You
We have partnered with the best companies from varying backgrounds to bring our fans more. Thank you to all of our partners that support us, making this journey possible.

  • Creative Labs

  • EVGA
  • TRENDnet


About the Game

EARLY ACCESS: Bleak is currently in early access, that means you should expect numerous bugs and unstable client builds. You should also expect to see us interacting with you, the player in making Bleak the best possible experience for as many as possible. We know we cant make everyone happy but we will try our best to make it an overall great game.

Don't be shy with your ideas either, we love hearing them. Even if you think its a silly idea, it may spark an even better version based on that idea.

Bleak is a Sci-Fi survival game. You must fight the planetary environments to survive and thrive. You can build bases, mine resources, research new technology and discover new flora and fauna. Play alone or coop with friends, its up to you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 "Quad Core"
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB dedicated video RAM, Shader Model 4.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 Fall Creators Update
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or Ryzen or better "Quad Core"
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / AMD Vega or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound BlasterX AE-5
  • Additional Notes: Creative Sound BlasterX AE-5 required for RGB lighting
